notes:
Sum of stem cross-section areas at a height of 1.3 m (dbh measurement height) of all living and dead trees and shrubs  starting at 12 cm dbh recorded according to the NFI1 method.  In NFI1 only those dead trees were recorded whose wood could still be exploited.

__Citation:__
